customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is absolutely beautiful, exactly what I was looking for to connect with my MacBook Pro. The metallic white and silver go well with the colors of my office, the colors are vivid, and I love the full 1080p display clarity. Makes multi-tasking while working on my digital designing a breeze, and videos look wonderful as well. I especially love how far to the edge the screen displays. Overall, I am very pleased with this monitor and can't wait until I have the ability to make room for another one in my office!

customer_reviews.title: A decent monitor for its category
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor mainly because of its small physical dimensions. If it weren't for the size limitations of my desk, I would have got a 4k display or gaming monitor. Pros: - Thin monitor, looks sleek - Screen resolution and quality was a bit better than I expected (comparing to normal Dell Desktop monitor you would probably use at work). - For the price, I'd say it's worth it. Cons: - Screen will often flicker when watching online videos. If you're planning to use this monitor for office, simple web browsing, viewing pictures, etc. this would be a good monitor. For entertainment purposes, not really.

product_meta.title: HP 22er 21.5-Inch Full HD 1080p IPS LED Monitor with Frameless Bezel and VGA & HDMI (T3M72AA) - Silver
product_meta.description: Enjoy crisp, vibrant views from almost any angle at an ultra-affordable price with the HP 22er 21.5-in monitor. As our thinnest LCD display yet, the sleek design is easy on the eyes and designed to be lightweight so that you can easily move the monitor between workspaces. Ultra-wide viewing angles and a frameless monitor design provide vivid entertainment in Full HD (1920 x 1080) resolution. Conveniently connect to your devices with 1 VGA and 1 HDMI ports on the back of the monitor. Our monitors are also Energy-Star certified to help you save on monthly energy costs. (Pixel pitch is 0.012 inches).
feature_bullets: Thin & lightweight — HP’s thinnest LCD display to date with a sleek, lightweight design for easy mounting and moving
Resolution & panel — 21.5-inch full HD monitor (1920 x 1080p @ 60 hertz) with 16:9 aspect ratio and an anti-glare matte IPS LED-backlit panel (7ms response time)
Bezel-less frame — A frameless ultra-widescreen provides a seamless multi-monitor set-up with 3-sided narrow bezels
Panoramic viewing — 178° horizontal and vertical viewing angles with adjustable tilt (-5° to 25°) for more comfortable viewing
Connectivity — 1 VGA and 1 HDMI with HDCP support for laptop or multi-monitor setups (VGA cord included)
Color & quality — Technicolor color certified for color-accuracy with HP enhance+ resolution for noise reduction to prevent picture overexposure
Custom OSD settings — Easily make room for more windows and add screen partitions with HP My Display software
Compatibility — Plug and play for all OS such as Windows & Mac OS for laptop connectivity (Note: USB-C/Thunderbolt 3-to-HDMI adapters required for 2016 MacBook Pros or later)
Responsibly made — Save your wallet with an Energy Star certified monitor that meets strict energy-efficiency guidelines and helps reduce your carbon footprint
Warranty — One-year limited warranty with 24-hour, 7 days a week web support when shipped from and sold by Amazon
